name: @preact-wmr-twind-zero/wmr1
description: Preact WMR Twind 'zero runtime' monorepo - WMR demo 1
author: Daniel Weck (https://github.com/danielweck)

scripts.postinstall: pnpm clean && rimraf "./.types" && rimraf "./public/.patched" && pnpm patch-preact-types && pnpm patch-preact-suspense-1 && pnpm patch-preact-suspense-2 && pnpm patch-preact-suspense-3
scripts.patch-preact-suspense-1: cpy "node_modules/preact/compat/src/suspense.js" "." --rename="public/.patched/suspense_.js" && sed -e "s/^options\._catchError = function/if (0) options._catchError = function/" -e "s/\._catchError/.__e/g" -e "s/\.\/util/.\/util.js/" -e "s/\._parentDom/.__P/g" -e "s/\._parent/.__/g" -e "s/\._component/.__c/g" -e "s/\._childDidSuspend/.__c/g" -e "s/\._dom/.__e/g" -e "s/\._dom/.__e/g" -e "s/\._children/.__k/g" -e "s/\._onResolve/.__R/g" -e "s/\._hydrating/.__h/g" -e "s/\._cleanup/.__c/g" -e "s/\.__hooks/.__H/g" -e "s/\._list/.__/g" -e "s/\._originalParentDom/.__O/g" -e "s/\._original/.__v/g" -e "s/\._pendingSuspensionCount/.__u/g" -e "s/\._suspenders/._suspenders/g" -e "s/\._forwarded/.__f/g" -e "s/\._detachOnNextRender/.__b/g" -e "s/\._nextDom/.__d/g" -e "s/\._force/.__e/g" -e "s/\_suspended/__e/g" -e "s/\._vnode/.__v/g" "public/.patched/suspense_.js" > "public/.patched/suspense.js" && rimraf "public/.patched/suspense_.js"
scripts.patch-preact-types: cpy "node_modules/preact/hooks/src/index.d.ts" "." --rename=".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts" && sed -e "1s/^/export as namespace preacthooks;\n/" -e "s/from '\.\.\/\.\.';/from '..\/node_modules\/preact\/src\/index.js';/" ".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts" > ".types/preact-hooks.d.ts" && rimraf ".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts"
scripts.build-no-prerender: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build
scripts.build_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-github_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* BUILD_FOR_GITHUB=1 wmr build --prerender && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-github-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-viz: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender --visualize && pnpm afterbuild
